name: I Beat The Game
description:
I Beat The Game

The Most Hardest And Annoying Game I Ever Created !.

Your Goal Is Just To Re-Arrange The Letter To "I Beat The Game".

( For More Information For How To Play This Game. See "Help" In The Game.)

This Game Made In 1 Day. And Created Using My Android. :3.

If You Want To Support Me. Check My Ko-Fi Page !.

> RzeL Ko-Fi Page.

Here Is My Youtube Video About Creating And Explaining This Game. :3.


I Hope You Like The Game !.
